statements.statement: INSERT INTO MES_WEB_ACCESS_LOG (MENU_ID, REGIST_DATE, REGIST_USER_ID) VALUES (#MENU_ID#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID#)

DECLARE @CUD_NUM INT
SET @CUD_NUM = NEXT VALUE FOR CUD_SEQ
INSERT INTO MES_WEB_CUD_LOG (CUD_NUM, MENU_ID, QUERY_ID, CUD_TYPE, CUD_PREV_DATA, CUD_CHANGE_DATA, REGIST_DATE, REGIST_USER_ID) VALUES (@CUD_NUM, #MENU_ID#, #QUERY_ID#, #CUD_TYPE#, #CUD_PREV_DATA#, #CUD_CHANGE_DATA#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID#)

SELECT CUD_NUM , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM MES_MENU_MA AS MM WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MM.MENU_ID = A.MENU_ID) AS MENU_NM , QUERY_ID , dbo.GET_COMM_DESC('CUD_TYPE', CUD_TYPE) AS CUD_TYPE , CUD_PREV_DATA , CUD_CHANGE_DATA , REGIST_DATE , REGIST_USER_ID , CONVERT_REGIST_DATE FROM ( SELECT CUD_NUM , MENU_ID , QUERY_ID , CUD_TYPE , CUD_PREV_DATA , CUD_CHANGE_DATA , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), REGIST_DATE, 121) AS REGIST_DATE , REGIST_USER_ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), REGIST_DATE, 112) AS CONVERT_REGIST_DATE FROM MES_WEB_CUD_LOG WITH(NOLOCK) ) A WHERE CONVERT_REGIST_DATE BETWEEN #SDATE# AND #EDATE# AND MENU_ID = (CASE WHEN #MENU_ID# = '' THEN MENU_ID ELSE #MENU_ID# END )

SELECT CUD_NUM , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM MES_MENU_MA AS MM WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MM.MENU_ID = CL.MENU_ID) AS MENU_NM , QUERY_ID , dbo.GET_COMM_DESC('CUD_TYPE', CUD_TYPE) AS CUD_TYPE , dbo.GET_WEB_CUD_LOGDATA(CUD_NUM) AS CUD_DATA , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), REGIST_DATE, 121) AS REGIST_DATE , REGIST_USER_ID FROM MES_WEB_CUD_LOG AS CL WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CUD_NUM = #CUD_NUM#
